title: CodeArt.DependencyInjection
description: CodeArt.DependencyInjection is a .NET Library that adds extra functionality (such as decorator pattern) to the DI container used in ASP.NET 5 projects
summary: CodeArt.DependencyInjection is a .NET Library that adds extra functionality (such as decorator pattern) to the DI container used in ASP.NET 5 projects
tags: DI, Dependency Injection, Decorator Pattern, DNX, Code Art, ASP.NET 5
releaseNotes: Initial version that currently have support for decorator pattern only.
